title: Fuel under Indian credit line arrive
body_lines: Ships freighting fuel such as diesel and petrol supplied under Indian credit line, berthed into Sri Lankan ports during the last 24 hours, the High Commission of India in Colombo said.
In a Twitter post, they said one consignment each of 36,000 MT of petrol and 40,000 MT of diesel have reached the country.
They said the cumulative supply of various types of fuel under the Indian assistance now stands at over 270,000 MT.
